com.paypal.pyplcheckout.merchantIntegration

Class PayPalWebViewUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paypal.pyplcheckout.merchantIntegration.PayPalWebViewUtils

  • public class PayPalWebViewUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    PayPalWebViewUtils - A utility class that provides merchants with shouldOverrideUrlLoading() & loadScript() functions to deal with webView integrations. NOTE: THIS CLASS IS NOT REQUIRED FOR NATIVE INTEGRATIONS.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PayPalWebViewUtils() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static PayPalWebViewUtils getInstance()
      PayPalWebViewUtils.getInstance() returns the singleton that can be used to set the configurations.
      void loadScript(android.webkit.WebView view)
      loadScript method loads a JavaScript file in the merchant's webView that is required to process transactions if the merchant is integrating using ^Checkout.js Sample Usage: The script needs to be loaded before the PayPal button is clicked.
      boolean shouldOverrideUrlLoading(android.webkit.WebView webView, java.lang.String url)
      shouldOverrideUrlLoading is a method that returns a boolean (stating weather to load the given url in the webView or not.

      • shouldOverrideUrlLoading

        public boolean shouldOverrideUrlLoading(android.webkit.WebView webView,
                                        java.lang.String url)
        shouldOverrideUrlLoading is a method that returns a boolean (stating weather to load the given url in the webView or not. This method behaves similarly to Android's shouldOverrideUrlLoading method provided by WebViewClient. Sample usage: The merchant has to implement their own version of a WebViewClient like below. public class TestWebViewIntercept extends WebViewClient {
        Parameters:
        webView - - webView provided by the shouldOverrideUrlLoading(WebView webView, final String url) from the merchants version of WebViewClient.
        url - - url provided by the shouldOverrideUrlLoading(WebView webView, final String url) from the merchants version of WebViewClient.
        Returns:
        boolean - This value determines if the merchants WebView needs to continue loading the Url or not.

      • loadScript

        public void loadScript(android.webkit.WebView view)
        loadScript method loads a JavaScript file in the merchant's webView that is required to process transactions if the merchant is integrating using ^Checkout.js Sample Usage: The script needs to be loaded before the PayPal button is clicked. Provided below is a sample way to load the script in the webView. public class TestWebViewIntercept extends WebViewClient {
        Parameters:
        view - - webView where the merchant is loading their application. NOTE: ^ To know more about Checkout.js please refer to the documentation here
